name: Vision of Aurora Borealis
description: A scenic visual novel about a young photographer who comes across a mysterious girl who changes his outlook on life and aspirations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: A short kinetic VN. The art style is really beautiful, and the BGM is quite good too. I loved the fact that the story takes place in Iceland, a colleague of mine went there once and said that it was an amazing country. I really wanted this VN to be a bit longer, just when I started to get more into the story, it was over. Hopefully, the upcoming side story will explain more about Gryla.   6/10.
